productShortDescription:
The FUN skirt is handmade and will be made after your order.
This skirt is made out of organic GOTS certified cotton. In a dark denim greyish blue with a very thin pinstripe.
fit:
High waiste, wide flowy skirt with a slit in the back.

Laurie wears size S-Tall and is 181cm.

XS/S for a waist between 60-68cm
S/M for a waist between 68-76cm
M/L for a waist between 76-84cm

Normal length ca 83cm
Tall length ca 93cm
care: Wash max. on 30 degrees, let it air dry, iron 1-2 points.
production:
This item is handmade by Lara in Zeeland and will be made after your order. 
The clothes are made- to - order to reduce overproduction and waste.
additionalNotes: The skirt is handmade and will be made after your order. Therefore the delivery time will take between 1 - 5 days on average.
